name: tabs4latex
short_description:
tabs4latex will be a simple converter from well known spreadsheet program like MS Excel or Open/ Libre Office Calc to LaTeX using html-files.

I need some programmer for this project, so if you want to develop with me please send an email to <tabs4latex@t-online.de>.

For now I am offering a csv to latex converter which does an similar job but it is less comfortable than this project will be. You can download it at <https://sourceforge.net/projects/csvtolatex/>.


What is planned:

- support of Windows and Linux distributions.
- starting and configuring the program with a configurationfile (like csvtolatex)
- automatic detection of greek letters used in the spread sheet
- automatic multirow and multicolumn detection
- automated conversion from Excel-spreadsheet to html using MS Excel
- and more.
summary: converts html-tables or Excel/Calc spread sheets to LaTeX-tables
